products.title: Utopia Sand Roller Blind
products.description: Sitting nicely on the colour chart between white and beige, sand is a gentle neutral shade and looks sweet and smooth upon the utopia roller blind fabric. With its light filtering properties, it also looks great in all sorts of windows to create a space of pure relaxation wit sitting nicely on the colour chart between white and beige, sand is a gentle neutral shade and looks sweet and smooth upon the utopia roller blind fabric.

products.title: Utopia Latte  Roller Blind
products.description: Designer style doesn't always have to be bold and brash, in fact sometimes it's nice just to appreciate the finer details, like the weave and feel. And that's exactly what tuiss have done with this utopia latte roller blind. Warm colour and simple texture go hand in hand to cre designer style doesn't always have to be bold and brash, in fact sometimes it's nice just to appreciate the finer details, like the weave and feel.

products.title: Utopia Latte Vertical Blind
products.description: With a shade that's warmer than cream, coffee hints, along with biscuit tones, the utopia latte vertical blind brings comfort and warmth to your home, as well as a smart look at your windows. Part of their tuiss collection, this blind comes with self-weighted louvers, so there's n with a shade that's warmer than cream, coffee hints, along with biscuit tones, the utopia latte vertical blind brings comfort and warmth to your home, as well as a smart look at your windows.

products.title: Utopia Sand Vertical Blind
products.description: If you're looking for a vertical blind that's neutral and holds a lot of class, this utopia sand vertical blind should be at the top of your list. Not only is it a soft beige-cream colour, but it's free from bottom chains for a smarter look.
